entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM: BrowserDebugHost.dll running from DevServer is missing roll-forward runtime policy #88391
  • The truncating conversion from BigInteger to Int128 ignores most significant bits #88389
  • JIT: Teach physical promotion to peel FIELD_ADDR nodes #88386
  • Additional Metrics for System.Net.Http #88384
    8.0.0
  • Implement the Metrics counterpart of System.Net EventCounters #88383
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 13 Regressions on 7/1/2023 10:14:52 PM #88376
  • Regression in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Matrix4x4.TransformBenchmark #88377
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CtorFromCollection<String> and System.Collections.CtorFromCollection<Int32> #88378
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 20 Regressions on 6/30/2023 4:39:46 PM #88375
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_33972/Runtime_33972/Runtime_33972.cmd #88361

Closed

  • Vector<T> Can't Read Data Properly. #88291
  • GC Gen size counters don't show on Linux in native AOT #87325
    8.0.0
  • TryParseExact not working properly for TimeSpan and custom format not working for "\" in DateTime and DateTimeOffset #88372
  • Additional metrics for .NET Core and ASP.NET Core #79459
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!(*use)->OperMayThrow(m_compiler)' #88349
    8.0.0
  • System.Uri considers all email addresses in same domain as equal #87564
    8.0.0
  • _marshal_task_to_cs calls complete_task on already completed task #87963
    8.0.0
  • [browser] configure rollup to minify internal method names #86447
    8.0.0
  • Handle dotnet/extensions scenarios for HttpClient logging #87247
    8.0.0
  • Handle dotnet/extensions scenarios in HttpClient metrics middleware #87245
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT Rd.xml file parsing should provide better reporting #64869
    Future
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization workaround instead of insufficiently sized destination buffer exception #88180
  • Bad Windows batch file syntax in libraries test script #88353
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Chrome crashes in debugger tests #86919
    8.0.0
  • Improve debugging experience of Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #86553
    8.0.0
  • Proposal: Update minimum CMake version required to build the dotnet/runtime repo to 3.20 #74027
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Respect KeepNativeSymbols when building cross compilers. #88398
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Fix another crash when using opaque pointers. #88397
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Disallow Options source gen produce diagnostics from outside the compilation #88396
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Rewrite DbBuffer Read/Write methods with stackalloc #88395
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Add SearchValues<string> #88394
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Improve non-SIMD block copy/init codegen #88393
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Inline more helpers in RegexParser #88392
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [browser] mono_exit improvements #88387
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Compute BB weights with higher precision, use tolerance in if-conversion #88385
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Propagate multi-reg-index for upper-vector-restore ref positions #88380
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MONO] Incorrect timestamp for perf events #88373
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Bring back old array enumerator code #88371
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing wbt changes #88370
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Precompute the CallInfo structure used by the mono_arch_..nati… #88369
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [libs][Unix][perf] Lazily initialize TimeZoneInfo names and order GetSystemTimeZones by Ids #88368
    needs-author-action, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • change regex options tests to extension method #88366
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix writing of WCHAR strings to event pipe buffer in nativeaot #88365
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update testing.md #88364
    area-Meta
  • Fix SIMD node DOT retType #88363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update missing runtime/framework install URL to use host RID #88359
    area-Host

Merged

  • Allow inlining array methods #88367
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Extract simd create opcodes in separate methods #88381
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the NotImplementedException within R2RDump. #88379
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Handle primitive-sized remainders overlapping padding/promotions in physical promotion #88109
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Quirk a quirk in fgExpandVirtualVtableCallTarget #88374
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Reenable disabled tests as mono now respects non-public custom attributes in dynamic assemblies #88322
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Remove empty files #88362
    area-Meta
  • Email addresses in same domain not equal #87721
    area-System.Net, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [browser] log errors of Task/Promise marshaling #88326
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Unified source file formatting #88330
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Workaround for insufficiently sized destination buffer #88184
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Remove conservative generic scanning logic #88360
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix libraries Windows test runner script #88354
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve LoggerFactory and Logger debugging #88313
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [RISCV] Fix .cfi directives for ThePreStub #88259
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Unify Default Comparer logic #88006
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Work around for Android builds using GCC for cross compiler native tools build #88345
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • NativeAOT Watson changes for crashes/unhandled exceptions #88273
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Using stackalloc instead of new byte[x] on Streams #88303
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Type equivalence support in Crossgen2 #87899
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [browser] Migrate more Blazor features, prepare JavaScript API for Blazor cleanup #87959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Make DoesConsoleSupportAnsi respect DOTNET_SYSTEM_CONSOLE_ALLOW_ANSI_COLOR_REDIRECTION #88241
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (6/6) #88093
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Internalize assetUniqueQuery as modulesUniqueQuery #88329
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Always look for SIMD fields during promotion #84122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - some refactoring, and rationalizing #88357
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging][mono][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #88336
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Remove support for llvm versions before 14.x. #88346
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono][interp] Add vectorization for Vector4 #87822
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Use wider look-up table while searching chars on Arm64 #88183
    arch-arm64, area-System.Buffers, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Fix unsafe walking of DacEnumerableHash #88063
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix floating point #88311
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Improve enum documentation #88191
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use optimized Index.GetOffset in Range.GetOffsetAndLength #87317
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Unified to throw NotSupportedException when SendFile() for connectionless sockets #87108
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
